about_the_game:
Shoot. Loot. Extract. Will you survive?

SINGLE PLAYER EXTRACTION SHOOTER

Enjoy a fully single player extraction shooter experience without the threat of PvP or cheaters. Choose between hardcore and casual modes to suit your desired experience. Play at your own pace without the fear of seasons, micro-transactions, wipes, or other progression-based resets. 

FIGHT OR DIE

Take on various threats as you loot what remains of the area. Take cover from other survivors and blast your way through the infected that stand between you and the nearest extraction point. 

GEAR UP

Experience satisfying gunplay as you gear up and kit out your firearms with grips, scopes, silencers, and tactical devices. Afterall, your chances of survival are only as good as the gear you bring with you. Grab what you can survivor.

HOME IS WHERE THE HEART IS

What's the point of gathering all that loot if you've got nowhere to put it? Bring each haul back to your personal camp to store your hard-earned loot, upgrade your base, and attract more traders to complete tasks for. The stagnant suffer. The proactive prosper.

FEATURES

  • Hardcore and Casual Modes - Hardcore mode provides a traditional extraction shooter experience where you lose everything on you if you die before extracting. Looking for something easier? Casual mode offers the excitement of the extraction shooter genre while allowing you to keep the gear you came in with if you die. Say goodbye to "Gear Fear" for good!

  • No progression wipes or resets. A fully single player extraction shooter experience that you can play at your own pace

  • Complete missions to upgrade traders and collect rewards

  • Satisfying Gunplay - Fluid first-person shooting and recoil where your stats actually matter. With over 30 firearms to experiment with, you're sure to find the right one for you

  • Gun customization with scopes, grips, tactical devices, muzzles, and magazines

  • Character Progression - Level up by completing missions to upgrade your stats and increase your chances of survival. Choose to increase your HP, improve your recoil control, upgrade your carry weight, or improve other stats

  • Stash - Store all the gear and loot you acquire each raid at your base

  • Base Progression - Upgrade your base with loot you collect. Expand your stash space, attract new traders, and improve the functions of your base for extra perks

  • Buying and Trading - Traders have various wares for sale in addition to giving missions. Gear up with what they have to offer or sell your loot to them for extra cash

content_descriptors.notes: Low-poly / cartoon blood splatter effects when enemies or player takes damage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-11400F
  • Graphics: RTX 960
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Cold Sweat is a first-person single player extraction shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Choose between a casual or hardcore experience as you complete missions for traders, collect loot, customize your firearms, and shoot your way through other survivors and the undead.
